Class.ClassComment: SerializeWith /** * Indicate that this class should be serialized with an instance of the given {@link Externalizer} class.Any externalizer type referred by this annotation must be either {@link java.io.Serializable} or {@link java.io.Externalizable} because themarshalling infrastructure will ship an instance of the externalizer to any node that's no aware of this externalizer, hence allowing for dynamic externalizer discovery. * @author Galder Zamarre√±o * @since 5.0 */
